results.title: Lower Extremity Arterial Disease in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Metformin Inhibits Femoral Artery Ultrastructural Alterations as well as Vascular Tissue Levels of AGEs/ET-1 Axis-Mediated Inflammation and Modulation of Vascular iNOS and eNOS Expression
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005264 @@@Femoral artery injury@@@ was established in the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ group as demonstrated by substantial alterations to the femoral artery ultrastructure, which importantly were ameliorated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Shati AA, Maarouf A, Dawood AF, Bayoumy NM, Alqahtani YA, A Eid R, Alqahtani SM, Abd Ellatif M, Al-Ani B, Albawardi A. Lower Extremity Arterial Disease in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Metformin Inhibits Femoral Artery Ultrastructural Alterations as well as Vascular Tissue Levels of AGEs/ET-1 Axis-Mediated Inflammation and Modulation of Vascular iNOS and eNOS Expression Biomedicines. 2023 Jan 26;11(2):. PMID: 36830898
